attributes.action: explain why he is spending the lowest level of defence spending as a proportion of GDP for over 60 years.Either increase the defence budget or get the  troops out of Afghanistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The level of defence spending is the lowest for 60 years when taken as a proportion of GDP. This is unacceptable whilst in the midst of a war.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
